name: IPhone
description: The iPhone has a camera and a music player (equivalent to that of the iPod), as well as software for sending and receiving text and voice messages.

name: HP EliteBook Dragonfly G3
description: The HP EliteBook Dragonfly G3 is, as its name suggests, like a dragonfly: aerodynamic, ultralight, durable, and technologically designed for productivity.

name: Gigabyte Aorus G5
description: The Gigabyte Aorus G5 KC-5ES1130SD is a powerful mid-range laptop with a 15-inch IPS LED screen and Full HD resolution, featuring a 144 Hz refresh rate.

name: Acer TravelMate
description: This Acer TravelMate P2 TMP214-53 is a device designed for productivity and multimedia use, with a 14-inch Full HD screen, although it's not particularly lightweight.

name: Tv X14313
description: The Medion X14313 is a modest smart TV in terms of features, belonging to the entry-level range, although it boasts a 43-inch screen diagonal and 4K resolution on a 60 Hz LED LCD panel.

name: LG Oled Flex
description: The LG OLED Flex is a 42-inch smart TV with 4K resolution, a 120Hz refresh rate, and OLED technology. The panel features a highly effective anti-reflective coating and is compatible with NVIDIA G-Sync and AMD FreeSync technologies.
